name: Finder of Evil
description:
A wandering hunter travels the world in search of unusual evil.
And the hunter stumbled upon a settlement in a forgotten land.
Now the purpose of his mission is to help these civilians.
This is where the adventure begins...
--------------------------------------------------
Feel free to rate the game and leave comments.
The game is free, donation is optional, but if you want, I will not mind, thank you very much :)
--------------------------------------------------
Game controls:
In the menu:
↓ - move down
↑ - move up
Z - action
In the game:
← - move left
→ - move right
C - jump
X - attack
Z - action
Game supports gamepad
--------------------------------------------------
Special thanks to all the guys who share their assets!!!
Music: *VOiD1 Gaming
Graphics: *Szadi art.
--------------------------------------------------
